apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: test-fake-secret
  namespace: default
  annotations:
    description: "Test fixture â€” not a real secret"
type: Opaque
data:
  # base64("FAKE-admin")
  username: RkFLRS1hZG1pbg==
  # base64("FAKE-password")
  password: RkFLRS1wYXNzd29yZA==
stringData:
  api-key: FAKE-api-key-not-real
